definition: medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
the benefits of medicine are not as great as those of good nutrition
pinyin: yao4 bu3 bu4 ru2 shi2 bu3

definition: ammunition depot

sentences.english: Food is an affordable medicine for all of us.
sentences.chinese: 對我們所有人來說，食物是一種最實惠的藥補方式。

sentences.english: Eating fish can be good medicine.
sentences.chinese: 喫魚可能起到藥補的作用。

sentences.english: What type of restoration do you use, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 醫生，那麼要用什麼藥補上？

sentences.english: Pei Bin pedal next person according to pour on the bed Ta, the drinking of darling medicine repairs body.
sentences.chinese: 裴彬被下人按倒在牀榻上，乖乖的喝藥補身子。

definition: holistic diagnosis and treatment (TCM)
reinforcing and reducing methods (in acupuncture)
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
timely/at the right moment/appropriate to the occasion/opportune/to fit current fashion
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely 望診|望诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), 聞診|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), 問診|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), 切診|切诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
inner product/the dot product of two vectors
to investigate
tonic
when things reach an extreme, they can only move in the opposite direction (idiom)
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
retort with challenging questions/debate
deficiency of 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
